yourkinders.description: I ATE SALAD INSTEAD OF MCDONALS. IM HEALTHY.
WENT TO THE GYM AT 9AM THIS MORNING. FEELS GREAT!!
I FINISHED MY HOMEWORK TWO DAYS BEFORE IT WAS DUE. I HAVE SO MUCH FREE TIME NOW.

yourkinders.act: I TOOK THE DAY TO RELAX
yourkinders.description: LAST WEEK WAS SO STRESSFUL. TAKING THE DAY OFF FEELS SO GOOD.
